choices: Naruto shrunk himself with an experimental jutsu
Nobody is aware of Naruto, he needs to find help
Naruto notices he is not the only tiny one
He is picked up for a mission
1.content:
Naruto walked the streets of the Hidden leaf village, having a normal day. He decides to head into an alley to urinate as he couldnt hold it any longer. He opens his fly behind a dumpster and finally alleviates the pressure.

"Ooooh boy... now that feels like heaven."

After fifteen minutes, Naruto still hasnt left the alleyway. And if you were to look for him in that alleyway, you would find that he had been shrunken down to the size of an ant!
1.title: #1 Tiny Ninja of the leaf

11.content:
"Alright it worked!", Naruto cheered.

In his new tiny form, Naruto reveled in the ginormous world he now found himself in. The alley seemed to stretch for miles and a discarded beer can was the size of Narutos apartment building!

Naruto couldnt wait to get out of the alley and explore more so he took off running until he finally exited the alley and entered the busy road of the leaf villages main street. So many unknowing giants passed by Naruto, among them he recognized..
11.title: Shrink no jutsu: Naruto style

choices: sakura recognizes him and is angry
sakura keeps trying to smack him
111.content:
Naruto jumps onto Sakura and climbs frantically up the kunoichi and when he finally reached her shoulder, he cupped his hands around his mouth.

He started shouting in her ear at the top of his voice, but she thinks he is a bug and tries to squish him! Naruto instantly runs towards the girls's neck and uses his chakra to begin running vertically up her neck, with every step he takes his feet sink down into her flesh. He narrowly slips past Sakuras fingers as she reaches to scratch the itch he causes.

"Hahaha! Guess that tickles huh Sakura?!?" he yells as he hops onto the finger that nearly smashed him and from there leaps into her hair.

Naruto once again avoids Sakuras hand as she swings it at him, he then pulls himself up to the top of her head by using her headband and stands on top of the metal hidden leaf symbol as Sakura entered her house and walked up to her room.

"Ugh... this things fast... what kind of bug is this?" you hear Sakura ask herself with a frustrated tone.

"Its me the number one tiny ninja of the leaf!!!" he yells as he hops from the headband onto her scalp and digs his feet into the top of her scalp repeatedly. "Bet that bother's you, huh?" he yells out to her as he slide down some hair to the top of her ear lobe, and from there he continued irritating her by climbing down and running into her ear canal.

"Hello out there!!!" he yells at the top of his lungs, "Wow Sakura! You really gotta clean up in here!"

Sakuras eyes widen in surprise.

"What? Who said that?"

Naruto climbs out of her ear canal and grabbed onto some hair and swung to the front of her face.

BO-ING BO-ING

Naruto landed onto the tip of Sakuras large nose and started jumping up and down while performing intricate dance moves.

"Hey Sakura! Look right here!" he yelled to her. Naruto continued to taunt her as...
111.title: prank Sakura

115.content: Far across the street, Naruto thought he could see...
115.title: Among the crowd

1151.content: The Yamanaka clan flower shop was across the steet and Naruto spotted Ino tending the counter. He may only be the size of an ant but that wasnt going to stop him from getting there. Naruto jumped onto person to person and used them to cross the street until he came to the front of the flower shop and went inside. He then climbed up the counter and Ino spotted him. "Naruto?" She picked him up between her thumb and finger and smiled at him. "Look at you! So tiny and frail."
1151.title: Into Inos flower shop

12.content: Naruto runs out of the alley and looks around, he sees that he is close to...
12.title: Nobody is aware of Naruto

choices: Shizune is using a table to sort files
121.content: The Hokage Residence is only a few meters down the street! Naruto makes his way towards it, opting to stick close to the walls of the shops and homes that lined the street in order to avoid the giant crushing feet of the village people passing by. Once he arrived at the door he slipped underneath and journeyed up to Tsunades office. Naruto climbed the stairs until he reached the hallway the office was located in.
121.title: To the Hokage residence

1212.content:
Naruto spots Shizune using one of the tables in the hallway to review a couple of files before taking them to Tsunade. Naruto knew that if he could get Shizune to take him somehow, he would get out of this mess alot quicker and easier. He ran over to Shizunes foot and craned his neck up high to look at her face.

"Shizune! Down here! Its Naruto!"

She doesnt react in the slightest. Theres no way she could hear him from way down here.
1212.title: Shizune is using a table to sort files

choices: Shizune feels a tickle on her foot
12122.content:
He approaches slowly, aware that at any moment that foot could move, crushing him without a thought. Shizune is like a goddess to Naruto now, with power beyond his imagining at her disposal. In comparison he felt as weak as if he was still a student at the academy. Especially since his chakra control had been unstable since he shrunk. It really was like he was a kid again.

It seems as if the foot was staying still for now. Those toes, resting on top of the sandal platform way above Narutos height, are wriggling slightly due to Shizunes anxiousness to drop off the files. Naruto approached. the base of her sandal

He then clambered up the shoe to stand in front of the toes, in awe of them and the foot to which they're attached. Then he looked up the vast length of her leg, and thought about how hes going to have to redefine his idea of big soon.Naruto then lifts himself up onto Shizunes big toe, but then found himself fighting for balance as she began to move.

Shizune had finished arranging the files properly, and began to walk down the hall towards Tsunades office.


It shifts and shakes, the foot moves up and booms down, yet Naruto continued to keep his balance.
12122.title: Aboard Shizunes foot

123.content: Naruto sees that a group is standing by the village gate...
123.title: The Giant gate

1233.content: Who else could be leaving?
1233.title: Other (gate)

125.content: Where else could Naruto look for help?
125.title: Other locations

choices: Tenten laying on the ground while Neji and Lee spar
1251.content: Naruto travels from the alley to the training grounds, avoiding "small"animals and giant stomping feet alike until he reached the woodsy area. He leaps from tree branch to tree branch until he arrives at a clearing where training takes place and sees
1251.title: Training grounds

14.content: Naruto noticed movement to his right. He looked over and saw the equally small body of...
14.title: Naruto notices he is not the only tiny one

142.content:
"Kakashi sensei!? You shrunk too?"

"Ah. Looks that way. Though why or how is still a mystery.", the elite jonin said. "All I remember is being blinded by a flash of light and ending up like this."

"Yeah me too. What should we do now?"

"Hm... I think our best bet would be to..."
142.title: Tiny Naruto meets Tiny Kakashi

1423.content:
"First things first, we better make our way out of this alley."

Naruto nodded and the two began to walk towards the exit when a ginormous silhouette of someone turned the corner into the alley and seemed to be nonchalantly walking towards them.
1423.title: Someone walks into the alley

choices: she spots them but thinks their bugs
14231.content:
From what Kakashi could tell by sight, this giant was in fact a giantess. For even though she was the size of Hokage mountain, her form was slender, though it was harder to tell due to what seemed to be some kind of coat she was wearing. Kakashi couldn't do much to deduce the identity of the titaness with his eyes, but his sense of smell was being flooded by the vastly amplified and familiar scent of his comrade.

While Kakashi had kept his cool against the approaching giantess, Naruto was not quite as collected.

"AHHHHHIE! Kakashi! That... thats the biggest person I've ever seen in my life!"

"Calm down Naruto! You have nothing to worry about from her. Shes a friend."

"What? Her? Who are you talking about Kakashi sensei? The light coming into the alley is too bright for me to make out who that is."

The crushing footsteps that vibrated the ground beneath the shrunken duos feet came closer before stopping a few feet away from them. At this distance Naruto could see the features of the woman before them.

"Hey! Kakashi sensei thats Anko sensei!"

Kakashi hummed in confirmation.

"Looks like our problems are about to get lighter... so long as she sees us."

"You got that right. HEY UP THERE!!! ANKO SENSEI!!!"

Anko had entered the alley because she thought she saw Kakashi enter earlier and wanted to speak to him about offering his assistance to help her and a squad investigate one of Orichimarus hideouts, but shortly after spotting him, she saw Naruto enter the same alley he did, but as far as she could tell, neither of them were here anymore.

"Thats odd. Where could those guys be?", she asked herself.
14231.title: Giant Anko in the Alley

choices: They miss and land on her foot
142312.content:
"Naruto. Its no use. Shes not listening for us right now. We need to find some other way to get her attention."

Narutos face grimmaced. Why couldnt things just be easy for once. He turned his gaze from his old sensei up to Ankos face high above him, focusing on the side of her head. He zeroed in on the bottom of Ankos earlobe which was peaking out slightly from inside a cascade of her short violet hair. That was quite a height to reach, but with chakra it should be a piece of cake for the elite 15 year old...um...genin... and his jonin friend.

"Hey sensei! Seems to me that the best way to go is up to her ear, dont you think?"

"Sure. Or at least high enough for her to hear or recognize us. Though that wont do us any good if we cant catch up to her."

"Huh? Catch up to her?... AHHH!"

Unbeknownst to Naruto, Anko had started to turn around and exit the alley, giving up the search for her comrades.

"Oh well. If they dont want to be found I'll just leave them to it.", she said.

Kakashi began to run after her, calling to Naruto to move it. Right away the ninja noticed something was different with their chakra. Like instead of their full chakra being made to fit proportional to their new tiny bodies, only enough chakra to fill the tip of a normal sized persons finger was made available. Kakashi figured that they could only rely on their chakra for five straight minutes before they completely exhaust themselves and would have to rest to recharge. Add to that, that they couldnt perform most of their jutsu in their arsenal as most would take more chakra than was available to them right now. For the foreseeable future, all they could do is weak mini versions at best. Kakashi was thankful that atleast they were in the presence of a trusted comrade who could help them.. so long as they could get her to notice them.

The tiny ninja ran forward after Anko, managing to catch up thanks to the little chakra they had. Kakashi called back to Naruto as they sped along.

"Hey Naruto! We need to get as high as possible before our chakra runs out! Lets use the objects lined up against the wall to gain higher ground and jump on Anko from there!"

Naruto looked over at the objects in question, seeing that they were piles of junk, trash cans and dumpsters.

"Right!"

They ran to they wall and parkoured up a slope of trash, onto a discarded cardboard box, leaped from the box onto the rim of a trash can and from there, jumped onto the closed lid of the dumpster. This course had drained a considerable amount of chakra. The distance between Anko and the dumpster was a good two feet, if they were to make the jump, that would be it for chakra for awhile.
142312.title: Anko doesnt hear them

1423121.content:
With a powerful leap Naruto and Kakashi cross the distance between them and Anko as she walked by. Her hand swayed back and forth as she stepped out of the alley making Naruto nervous he would miss and get seperated from Kakashi. However, his worries were washed away when Ankos hand grew larger and larger to his point of view as they soared through the air.

Finally, Narutos entire field of vision is taken up by the skin of Ankos hand as he and Kakashi slam against it and cling tightly to avoid falling off. Naruto pressed hard against her hand, feeling the warmth of her flesh against his hands and face.

Anko had remained unaware of the tiny Kakashi and Naruto on the ground, and was still unaware that they were now latched onto the back of her left hand. Her arms continued to sway as she exited the alley and joined into the crowded streets, making Naruto feel a little motion sick before summoning the will to calm his nerves. Naruto looked at the area of Ankos hand ahead and worried when he didnt see Kakashi at first, but once again, his nerves calmed when he saw Kakashi had just landed below him a little bit above Ankos knuckle.

"Oh man...", he groaned as he recovered. "Uh... ah! Alright, we made it! Come on Kakashi sensei lets get to climbing!"

Naruto halted when he felt Kakashi tug on his leg.

"Hold on."

"What? Why?"

"Because Im sure you noticed that our chakra has been drastically reduced. If you want to climb all the way up Anko now, you'll have to do it by primarily using your muscles. Which would be difficult enough, even if we werent on a living mountain and already winded as it is."

He was right. Naruto knew that. But he still had enough faith in his abilities to believe that he could make the journey to the ear, even without a chakra boost. He could get all the rest he wanted after he and Kakashi were restored to normal.

"I see your point sensei. But the sooner we get Anko to help us the sooner were no longer pip squeaks!"

Kakashi released his grip on Narutos leg.

"Just hear me out here. Look up ahead on Ankos wrist.", Kakashi said while pointing his finger past Naruto.

Naruto followed his direction and looked up along Ankos hand to her wrist. Up ahead, in her coat, hidden beneath the shadow of her sleeve, Anko was wearing a black wrist watch.

"Huh? Her watch? I dont get it."

"If we can stick around here long enough for me to regain the right amount of chakra, I can try to use the metal in that watch to amplify my lightning style jutsu and shock Anko. With the end result hopefully getting her to look down here and spot us."

"Leave it to Kakashi to come up with a plan"., Naruto thought to himself.

He thought it over and..
1423121.title: They latch onto Ankos hand

choices: They take off at high speed causing them to fall out of her sleeve onto her nail
They walk allowing them to stay on her watch
14231212.content:
"Yeah. Okay sensei thats the plan. But what do we do in the meantime while your building up chakra?"

"Well, i suppose we cant just hang out here. We might as well make our way to that watch now."

Naruto nodded and the two of them began crawling up the warm wall towards the watch.

"Be careful not to dig into her skin to hard Naruto! We dont want Anko mistaking us for just an itch.", Kakashi warned.

The thought sent chills down Narutos spine. The image of him and Kakashi being grinded into paste by giant fingernails was definitely not a way Naruto was comfortable going out too. Though keeping his grip against such a smooth surface was hard, especially without chakra. Not to mention today was quite breezy and Anko was swaying her arm. He would have to rely solely on his physical training to get to that watch. Their climb continued further up the back of her hand until they crossed the threshold between Ankos sunlit skin and the shaded area beneath the sleeve. They had entered the arm of her overcoat and were near the crown of the watch. Upon getting so close, Naruto realized that climbing over it from the crown to case would be borderline impossible.

"Argh! Dammit! That watch is too big for us to just climb onto!", he exclaimed.

"I see what you mean. Hm... come on. We'll move to the side and use the strap to get to the other side."

"Right!"

As they were busy on her hand, Anko was now in sight of the village gate, where she saw the team the Hokage had assembled for her already waiting for her there and talking to the two gate guards, Kotetsu Hagane and Izumo Kamizuki. Anko sighed, she wasnt really in the mood to get into a conversation with those guys. As she got closer, the first to notice her was a woman with long purple hair dressed in Anbu gear.

"Anko! Did you find Kakashi?", Yugao asked.

"Sure did. For about a second before he up and vanished on me."

*
"Did you hear that Sensei? Sounds like she was looking for you in that alley!", said Naruto, as he crawled to the top of the watches strap.

Kakashi had reached the top of bezel and was standing vertically, waiting to pull Naruto up with him.
"Well, she may not have found me but we sure found her. And it looks like Im going on this mission anyway."

*
"Kakashi just vanished? Really? I know he likes to do that to his students but...thats not like him."

Anko chuckled. "Yeah thats what I thought. But if hes too "busy" for us then it cant be helped. He just wont be treated to lunch by Yamato when we get back like the rest of us."

"Huh? Me? I never said..." Yamato started before being interrupted.

"Come on Yamato its the gentlemanly thing to do.", Kotetsu chimed in. "Ofcourse, if...if he doesnt feel like it I would be more than happy to take you out sometime Anko."

"Well what a kind offer Kotetsu. Unfortunately, Im going to be busy avoiding you so I wont be able to make it."

Kotetsu slumped over his desk in defeat, while the last member of the squad, Kurenai, began to talk once she was done laughing.

"Anyway Anko. I hope you dont mind me saying but I had to bend over backwards in order to free enough time to go on this mission for you. Could you go over the mission one more time?"

"(Sigh)... okay okay one more time. Listen up people! Our mission is to check out some intel regarding one of Orochimarus hideouts. Its unlikely we'll find him there but theres reason to believe hes left behind some of his research. Needless to say we dont want that to fall into the wrong hands so its up to us to retrieve it. And thats about the jist of it. Now then, lets get this show on the road!"

"Right!", the other squad members shouted in unison.
14231212.title: Operation Shockwatch

choices: Let go and splat into someones face
Anko and the team sets up camp
142312121.content:
"Damn! Shes leaving the village."

"Should we leave and look for someone else?"

"Well... we made it this far already. Though once we get Ankos attention I imagine she'll be pretty annoyed we interupted her mission."

"(Sigh)... cant be helped now I guess. How much longer until you build up enough chakrrrAAAAAA!!!"

The arm Naruto and Kakashi were on suddenly moved as Anko and her squad took off into the trees, compromising the little stowaways stance on her wrist watch and causing them to uncontrollably lurch forward, land on the smooth dial and slide until they flew off the watch and landed back on Ankos hand. They continued to slide at high speeds along the back of the hand until they bounced off her knuckle and entered into a zero gravity state, where they now found themselves hovering slightly above the fleshy platform below them as it continued moving forward. If they didnt grab onto to something soon, Anko would be out of reach and they would be not only on their own, but also thousands of feet high in the air.

Kakashi had managed ro scrape together enough chakra to allow him to stick to surfaces again, so he reached out and planted his hand on Ankos fingernail. Kakashi then reached out and grabbed Narutos ankle.

"AAAAAHHH!!! Pull me in pull me in pull me in!!!", Naruto howled.

Kakashi dragged the boy over to him until Naruto could grab hold of the nail aswell. For the next few minutes, they stayed there. The wind smashing against their faces as Anko glided through the trees. This surface was too smooth for Kakashi to have confidence in as reliable. He gazed forward along the length of Ankos arm towards the back of her head. Damn. That was quite a distance to travel. If only Anko had stayed still, Kakashi could have shocked her watch and gotten her to find them. But whats done is done.

Only thing to be done now is come up with another plan...
142312121.title: Nail hold

info.brief_description: Characters from the anime Naruto Shippuden/Naruto are reduced in size
info.description:
As far as I know there are three Naruto stories out there. Unfortunately, I found them later so options i would have liked to add to had already been used up. I figured i could start a fresh one just because so this is it. There aren't really any rules aside from no one sentence chapters, deviating from pre-established material or just scummy stuff like that.

Every add will be rewarded with 500 gp. Hope you enjoy :)

Oh and be sure to check out the others aswell.
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1198746-Naruto-Shrinking-Story

https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1446642-Naruto-Shrinks
